_instructions: To add custom prefixes, copy this file to your CIVET config directory (Settings > Open Config Directory) and add entries below. CIVET will load your custom file on next startup.

B+S.description: This prefix is for use in creating various tags used by the author in projects on CIF, mmCIF, imageCIF, etc. to avoid conflict with the standard dictionaries.

BplusS.description: Alternative to B+S for use with DDLm

H5.description: HDF5 related tags for CIF support of HDF5 and NeXus

ISO.description: Tags used by the ISOTROPY Software Suite

LANL.description: For internal use of the XRD service at Los Alamos National Lab

NIEHS.description: general-use local prefix for NIEHS (National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences)

NX.description: Nexus-related tags for CIF HDF5/NeXus integration

SSAD.description: Prefix for Sulfur SAD Database CIFS

TOPOS.description: Prefix names for the data items generated by the ToposPro software

acihd.description: local names used by ACI Heidelberg

aflow.description: Tags for AFLOW high-throughput Density Functional Calculations

amcsd.description: Identifier for file created as an entry in the American MIneralogist Crystal Structure Database (http://rruff.geo.arizona.edu/AMS/amcsd.php)

bruker.description: Used by Bruker AXS software for items not covered in core and mmCif dictionaries

cambridge.description: Prefix for University of Cambridge internal CIF items

cod.description: Prefix used for data items added by COD maintainers and depositors.

crystmol.description: Used by CrystMol software for items not covered in core and mmCif dictionaries

dft.description: A prefix for data pertaining to density functional theory calculations, such as convergence criteria, precise method used etc.

edchem.description: Our locally-invented cif names (Edinburgh University Chemistry)

iims.description: Integration of Information about Macromolecular Structure. Integration of the results of 3D Electron Microscopy with existing data models from X-ray and NMR methods.

itqb.description: Local names of Instituto de Tecnologia Quimica e Biologica da Universidade Nova de Lisboa, Oeiras, Portugal, especially for molecular modelling extensions

manchester.description: For internal use of the XRD service at The University of Manchester

mdb.description: Model Database, database of model structures of biological molecules

montpellier.description: Prefix for University of Montpellier internal CIF items

mp.description: Information specific to the Materials Project (MP) database and its related software tools. See materialsproject.org and github.com/materialsproject for more information.

mpod.description: prefix used in the MPOD database: www.materialproperties.org

msd.description: data items for the European Bioinformatics Institute Molecular Structure Database Group

naned.description: Prefix for CIF entries created within the project NanED for 3DED data. Proposals for expanding CIF dictionary to fully accomodate 3DED data.

ndb.description: Nucleic Acids Database Project, Rutgers University

nomad.description: Data names defined by the NOMAD Center of Excellence for theoretical material science calculations and structures.

nottingham.description: Prefix for University of Nottingham internal CIF items

oxford.description: Used in conjunction with the Oxford CRYSTALS program

parvati.description: validation and statistical summaries from PARVATI validation server http://www.bmsc.washington.edu/parvati

pdbx.description: Protein Data Bank - exchange dictionary prefix

phenix.description: PHENIX is a software suite for the automated determination of macromolecular structures using X-ray crystallography and other methods.

prop.description: prefix for properties as used in the MPOD database: www.materialproperties.org

publcif.description: Local items used by the publCIF editor

raman.description: Data items for recording spectra obtained by Raman spectroscopy technique.

rayonix.description: Information specific to Rayonix (Mar USA) instruments

rotag.description: Prefix used for the data items generated by rotag software.

solsa.description: SOLSA H2020 project Sonic Drilling coupled with Automated Mineralogy and chemistry On-Line-On-Mine-Real-Time)

sydney.description: Prefix for University of Sydney internal CIF items

tcod.description: Data names specific to the Theoretical Crystallography Open Database, http://www.crystallography.net/tcod

wdc.description: Entries in the World Directory of Crystallographers

xtal.description: Entries in the World Directory of Crystallographers

category_dictionary_suggestions._comment: Suggestions for dictionary files based on CIF category prefixes (not local prefixes)
